get.description:
Get user's basic info

More detailed info can be fetched from Mastodon API

Search items in catalog

count and pages are estimated, the actual data may be less

unlike the web search, this does not show external results,
nor does it parse a url to fetch an item. to do that, use /catalog/fetch.

get.summary: Fetch item from URL of a supported site
get.description:
Convert a URL from a supported site (e.g. https://m.imdb.com/title/tt2852400/) to an item.

If the item is not available in the catalog, HTTP 202 will be returned.
Wait 15 seconds or longer, call with same input again, it may return the actual fetched item.
Some site may take ~90 seconds to fetch.
If not getting the item after 120 seconds, please stop and consider the URL is not available.
Returns a list of galleries, each gallery is a list of items, deprecated, removing by May 1 2025
Get collections created by current user

post.description:
Create collection.

`title`, `brief` (markdown formatted) and `visibility` are required;

get.description: Get items in a collection collections
List notes by current user for an item

post.description: Add a note for an item

get.description:
Get reviews by current user

`category` is optional, reviews for all categories will be returned if not specified.
Get review on current user's shelf by item uuid

post.description:
Create or update a review about an item for current user.

`title`, `body` (markdown formatted) and`visibility` are required;
`created_time` is optional, default to now.
if the item is already reviewed, this will update the review.

delete.description: Remove a review about an item for current user.

get.description: Get holding mark on current user's shelf by item uuid

post.description:
Create or update a holding mark about an item for current user.

`shelf_type` and `visibility` are required; `created_time` is optional, default to now.
if the item is already marked, this will update the mark.

updating mark without `rating_grade`, `comment_text` or `tags` field will clear them.

delete.description: Remove a holding mark about an item for current user, unlike the web behavior, this does not clean up tags.

get.description:
Get tags created by current user

`title` is optional, all tags will be returned if not specified.

post.description:
Create tag.

`title` is required, `visibility` can only be 0 or 2; if tag with same title exists, existing tag will be returned.

put.description:
Update tag.

rename tag with an existing title will return HTTP 409 error

get.description: Get items in a tag tags

Get posts for an item

`type` is optional, can be a comma separated list of "comment", "review", "collection", "mark"; default is "comment,review"
